name: Lorenz Breidenbach
description: Lorenz Breidenbach is the Head of R&D at Chainlink Labs. He is a security researcher and former BRIDGE fellow from ETH ZÃ¼rich and IC3.  He's been working on Ethereum-adjacent research since 2017 on projects such as Flashboys 2.0, libsubmarine, GasToken.io, and "Enter the Hydra".
